itemDisplayName: Windows Server 2016 Storage Spaces Direct (S2D) NFS cluster
description: This template creates Azure VMs on an existing VNET, and it provisions them as a Windows Server 2016 Storage Spaces Direct (S2D) Network File System (NFS) cluster.
summary: This template creates Azure VMs for a Windows Server 2016 Storage Spaces Direct (S2D) NFS cluster on an existing Azure VNET with existing DNS servers.
